under_construction

Class DistanceKeeperFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • under_construction.DistanceKeeperFacade

  • public class DistanceKeeperFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as a facade for the distanceKeeper module. Other parts of the program can use this class to calculate the effect that should be sent to the engine when ACC is activated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DistanceKeeperFacade(double targetValue, double constantP, double constantIRelation, double constantDRelation) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calculatePIDValue(double targetDistance, double deltaTime)
      This method uses the different classes in the distanceKeeper module in order to calculate the desired engine effect.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • DistanceKeeperFacade

                            double constantP,
                            double constantIRelation,
                            double constantDRelation)

    • Method Detail

      • calculatePIDValue

        public double calculatePIDValue(double targetDistance,
                                double deltaTime)
        This method uses the different classes in the distanceKeeper module in order to calculate the desired engine effect.
        Parameters:
        targetDistance - the current distance to the object in front of the moped, given in cm.
        deltaTime - delta Time since last call.
        Returns:
        the core.pid-value for distance keeping.
